availability.licence: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

correction.p: OCR generated transcript has not been corrected.

normalization.p: Only minor normalization where needed, if any, is indicated via markup.

punctuation.p: All punctuation marks in the source text have been retained, and are represented by appropriate Unicode code points.
Punctuation may be marked up with pc elements for clarification, but not exclusively.

quotation.p: All quotation marks have been retained, and are represented by appropriate Unicode code points.

hyphenation.p: Hyphenated words that appear at the end of a line have been retained. The hyphen, if present, is represented by the Unicode code point, and marked up with a pc element. The break="no" attribute on the lb element indicates that a single word is split across the lines.

interpretation.p: Dates, places, and names may be marked up, where useful.

body.ab:
July 11, 2002
1404 Apache St
Arlington, TX 76012-4302
Hi Chris, Missy and Holley,
Enclosed are the pages from the DOUGLASS/MOSHER Bible. Have fun!!
Following is Deo and Dorothy's address. If you want, I can get the
address for Harriet, the cousin who has the Bible.
Mr. and Mrs. Deo A. Padgett
17456 Plaza Otonal
Rancho Bernardo, OA 92128
1-858-676-1100
Take care.
Ruth Coker
CASSELL'S
ILLUSTRATED BIBLE:
CONTAINING
The Old and New Testaments,
WITH
REFERENCES,
NUMEROUS
CRITICAL AND EXPLANATORY NOTES,
AND A
CONDENSED CONCORDANCE.
ILLUSTRATED WITH
More than Nine Hundred Highly Finished Engravings.
W. J. HOLLAND & CO.,
SPRINGFIELD, MASS., AND CHICAGO, ILL.
[A transcription of this page is not available.]
SUFFER LITTLE CHILDREN TO COME UNTO ME
BIRTHS
Elijah Douglass, May 14, 1835.
Julia A. Douglass, July 14, 1845
children
Arthur E. Douglass, Dec. 30, 1866.
Charles La Mott Douglass, Sept., 8, 1869.
Julia Ellen Douglass, Feb. 4, 1871.
Addie La Dell Douglass, July 11, 1874.
Alice M. Douglass, July 11, 1874.
Walter Roland Douglass, Jan. 18, 1877.
James Garfield Douglass, July 31, 1881.
John William Douglass, March 26, 1886.
BLESSED IS THE MAN THAT HATH HIS QUIVER FULL OF THEM
VAN DARGENT
A VIRTUOUS WOMAN GROWN OF JEWELS TO HER HUSBAND
MARRIAGES
Elijah Douglass & Julia A. Mosher,
Sept. 13, 1864.
children
Arthur E. Douglass to Addie Young ?
Alice Mabel Douglass to Rev Myron E. Bailey June 25,
in South Hamilton NY by Rev A. E. Douglass of Pleasantville
N.J.
James Garfield Douglass to Polly ?
John William Douglass to Bessie Eliza Burhyte on July 26, 1913
in Berkeley California (Born Aug 11, 1892)
WHOSO FINDETH A WIFE FINDETH A GOOD THING AND OBTAINETH FAVOUR OF THE LORD
VAN DARGENT
DEATHS
Julia Ellen Douglass, Apr. 15, 1871.

Elijah Douglass, May 3, 1927
Alice Mabel Bailey Oct 24 1949
Charles L. Douglass April 3, 1950

Bessie Eliza Burhyte Douglass April 14, 1967
I AM THE RESURRECTION AND THE LIFE.
